long_description: The lightweight, versatile men's REI Tech-Compatible One gloves keep hands warm and provide excellent dexterity during winter walks, runs and cross-country ski outings. Polyester soft-shell fabric stretches and breathes while resisting rain and wind; soft polyester inner face offers lightweight warmth. Conductive leather at the thumbs and index fingers allows you to operate your touch-screen phone without having to take your gloves off. Leather palms ensure you have a good grip on ski poles and other winter gear. REI Tech-Compatible One gloves have long cuffs to keep out snow and wind.
short_description: The lightweight, versatile men's REI Tech-Compatible One gloves keep hands warm and provide excellent dexterity during winter walks, runs and cross-country ski outings.
